alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 23 at 1:31PM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in south central Missouri, Howell, Oregon, Shannon and Texas. In southwest Missouri, Douglas and Ozark. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Frozen ground with a 4 to 5 inch frost depth with a half inch to inch of rain will likely cause some low water crossings to flood tonight. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Shannon; Texas
